body.name: 4K Digital Camera, 56MP Vlogging Camera with 3'' 180-degree Flip Screen, 16X Zoom Auto Focus Point and Shoot Digital Camera for Photography, 32GB Card & 2 Batteries for Teens Students Kids Boys Girls
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 43 mins
features: 【4K 56MP Digital Camera】: The digital camera has a 56MP image resolution and 4K video recording capabilities. The 16x zoom camera allows you to capture landscapes from a long distance without sacrificing image quality, ensuring clarity in every moment you want to capture! Whether it's a fast-paced tennis match or an intense chess battle, you can rely on this vlog camera to capture the essence of the competition.

【Fast Autofocus System】: At a lively family gathering, the flip screen camera's upgraded autofocus function shines. As you navigate through the crowd, the camera swiftly identifies your subjects within 1-2 seconds. If the focus is slightly off, a quick adjustment of the 4K camera allows you to re-focus. With a simple press of the shutter halfway, once the focus frame turns green, a full press of the shutter completes the shooting process, ensuring you capture beautiful family memories effortlessly.

【Digital Camera with Flip Screen】: This travel digital camera features a 180-degree 3" flip screen, allowing you to see what you are recording. For instance, when you need to take pictures with other people, you can use the self-timing function to capture clear group photos. The 3-inch UHD screen of this kids digital camera is bright and clear even when used outdoors.

【Mode Dial and Webcam Functionality】: This vlogging camera offers 9 different modes that can be selected using the mode dial. It can also function as a webcam and can be connected to a computer via a USB cable. This feature is particularly useful for content creators who want to live-stream on social media platforms, enhancing the interactivity and attractiveness of their content. The small camera also supports external lens and 3.5 mm microphone connectivity.

【Long-Lasting Battery Life】: The battery life of this small 4K camera is highly impressive, and it comes equipped with 2 batteries.It automatically turns off when there is no operation to extend the battery life.If you need to record for an extended period, the cheap camera can be charged by connecting it to a power source while continuing to record, without worrying about running out of battery power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile camera- Great quality pictures
reviews.reviewText: This small camera is versatile and easy to use for people like me who have no experience. The buttons to switch from video to photography are on the right side with images that one clearly understands. I love that it comes with two batteries, because it can be taken anywhere and always have another charged one as a spare. I loved that it already came with a 32Gb memory card, but I put in one of 250Gb and the camera has worked well. Overall, a very good purchase and if you are like me looking for something affordable and of good quality, this is definitely the camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great starter camera for 12+
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little camera for 12+yr olds. Better than a toy, and not so complicated that it takes a degree to understand it's operation. It has a good heft to it that feels well made. The rotating LCD makes it extra fun for selfies. In the days where everyone has a cell phone why have a P&S camera? This gives you the option of being offline and distraction free when taking pictures. The pictures produced tend to be on the cooler side straight out of the camera, but overall very nice quality. For a camera under $100 this is a steal. Camera comes with 2 batteries, charging cable, and 32GB microSD card. I was easily able to fill the 32GB card in one battery charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good camera with 16x digital zoom, great for beginners, easy to use. Comes with two batteries, 32GB microSD card, and a USB-C charging cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend, a great 4k digital camera!
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding 4K Digital Camera! This camera is a game-changer for both amateur and professional photographers. The image and video quality are exceptional, offering stunning clarity and detail. The ease of use and intuitive controls make it a joy to operate, while the compact and durable design ensures it's ready for any adventure. Whether capturing breathtaking landscapes or precious moments with loved ones, this camera delivers outstanding results every time. I highly recommend this 4K Digital Camera to anyone in search of top-tier performance and reliability!We love it, and so happy we got it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera for a recent trip abroad. I needed something I could just toss in my bag and bring out whenever I needed a quick pic. This delivered very well for what I needed.The screen can be flipped around if you want to take a selfie or a vlog and the quality is way better than using the front facing camera on the phone.Would definitely get more since the price is so good, it also comes with a micro sd and two batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved this camera!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A beautiful product and a super affordable price! It comes with all the basic functions. The image quality is also good, especially during daytime photography. It's easy and fast to take photos and you can zoom in and out quickly. It is very easy to operate and its compact size makes it comfortable to wear. Ideal for beginners, especially for children and adolescents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome for the price! The photo quality is really good, and it's super easy to use. The size makes it really easy to carry around and its really useful being able to flip the screen. No complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET IT NOW
reviews.reviewText: Used this camera for a recent trip. I use my camera on my phone, but sometimes the battery on it dies. So thats where this camera came in handy. The screen can be flipped around if you want to take a selfie or a vlog and the quality is way better than using my iphone. Will prob get another for a friend since the price is so good, it also comes with a micro sd and two batteries, can't beat it!
